name: Spectrail
description:
Yes! You're on a mission! 

Infiltrate the enemy base, collect all their batteries to power up your super suit: the Spectrail!

Each level is deeper, you'll need to be careful. Dodge and stun guards, grow your trail. Strategize the best path to unlock the door, but avoid your own Spectrail!

Complete all 4 missions and try to beat your highscore. Don't lose hope, you may die, but you'll learn to adapt and overcome the big challenges we have for you.

Controls :

WASD / Arrow keys to move.

Escape / Spacebar to pause / unpause.

For a more immersive experience, download the Windows version below!
